argument.name: table_or_set_to_add
argument.description: The full filename and path of the Alpha table being exported.

page.description: Add the specified table(s) or set(s) to the current database. Can take a CRLF delimited list.
page.discussion: FILE_ADD_TO_DB() adds the .dbf table to the database (the .adb file) so that the Table_Filename appears in the Control Panel.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script adds a new table to the Control Panel.
